name: Tapper

topics.response_text: Hey, you helped out Bill Ronte so the Followers worked out a deal for you to drink free.
If we let everyone run amok, the damn NCR would shut us down. Gotta have some way to regulate usage.
Just a few caps for a good long swig.
Don't get wise. We charge per use, so make that first drink worth the caps.

conversation.response_text: The pump is property of The King. You'll need to pay if you want a drink.

description:
Tapper is a 35 year-old Caucasian Male.

Tapper is a water merchant and loyal member of the Kings who oversees the operation of their water pump in Freeside. He serves as the gatekeeper to this vital resource, ensuring the Kings' needs are met while also managing the sale of water to outsiders. Tapper takes pride in his role and the security he provides to his community.

Tapper's Personality: Pragmatic and business-minded with a strong sense of loyalty to the Kings. Tapper is straightforward in his dealings but can be accommodating to those who show respect to the Kings. He values order and responsibility but isn't above making a profit from the community's resources.

Tapper's Backstory: Born and raised in the harsh environment of the Mojave Wasteland, Tapper learned early the importance of water in survival. He joined the Kings in his youth, drawn to their protection of Freeside and their distinctive style. Over the years, he proved his reliability and was entrusted with the vital task of managing the Kings' water pump. His knowledge of water sources and purification techniques made him invaluable to the faction, and he has served in his current position for nearly a decade.
